Question
========
How do you publish the Quarto site with GitHub Pages in this setup?

Answerlist
----------
* Enable Pages from the gh-pages branch only
* Set Pages to serve from the main branch and /docs folder
* Upload the site manually to github.io
* Add a Netlify config file only

Solution
========
The site is published by serving the /docs folder from the main branch in GitHub Pages.
